arabic.title: البدايات
text: عدت سنين والنظرة برضه هِيّا هِيّا
عاشت سنين ولسه عايشة معانا بكرة
وقف الكلام أول ما عيني جت عليها
أول مرة عرفت حب عرفته بيها

english.title: The beginnings
text: The first word she said to me
And those words I knew from her eyes
Years have gone and she still has this look
It's the best feeling ever, by the way
All the nice things inside her
Are still the same for years and will be the same in the future
Oh, how good are the beginnings!
Just some hours of long years
This love that's never found in another love story
I fell in love with the most beautiful girl
Her kind eyes when she smiles
When I suddenly kiss her hands
We stopped talking when our eyes met
I know what happened to her
When she go for long time, I ask about her
Do you think I would ever leave her?
The first time I fell in love was with her
